report.title: UKBMS Recorder Names list
report.description: An list of text names used for the recorder names attribute entered by the user - this assummes Easy Login.
report.query: SELECT distinct(sav.text_value) as name FROM sample_attribute_values sav JOIN samples s ON s.id = sav.sample_id and s.deleted = FALSE WHERE sav.deleted = FALSE AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #attr_id# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#') AND (CAST(sav.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#') ORDER BY name

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user
